duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and register guests, provide outstanding customer service, and settle guest accounts upon completion of their stay.
Register guests, make and modify reservations, and handle hotel operator and concierge duties.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance and grooming, comply with hotel policies, and maintain regular attendance.
Handle guest inquiries, requests, and check-ins/check-outs in a friendly and efficient manner.
Maintain proper operation of the telephone switchboard and use proper two-way radio etiquette when communicating with associates.
Be aware of hotel products, guest services, room rates, promotions, and emergency procedures.
Maintain an up-to-date knowledge of property amenities, local area attractions, and participate in the creation of an enjoyable work environment.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent (College coursework in related field helpful)
